name: El Presidente versus La Revolucionistas [LD50]
description:
El Presidente is too old to fight anymore - all he can do is defend himself against the onslaught of La Revolutionistas. Despite that, he refuses to give up his authority and tries to hold out for as long as he can. But ultimately, the revolution is inevitable.

Controls:

A, D to move your character

C to crouch

Space to jump

Block like in fighting games (hold away from the enemy, crouch to block low, stand to block attacks from the air)

Made by cross, Moczan and WillQ for Ludum Dare 50 "Delay the inevitable"

Boxing Bell Signals by Saviraz https://freesound.org/people/Saviraz/sounds/520998/
Lucha Libre SF by RTB45 https://freesound.org/people/RTB45/sounds/402304/
